Member Function Documentation

+ (AmazonServiceResponse * AmazonWebServiceClient.)constructResponseFromRequest: (AmazonServiceRequest *)  request  

Constructs an empty response object of the appropriate type to match the given request object.

Parameters:
request An instance of a subclass of AmazonServiceRequest.
Returns:
An instance of the appropriate subclass of AmazonServiceResponse, or an instance of AmazonServiceResponse if there is no response class to match the instance passed in.
- (id AmazonWebServiceClient.)initWithAccessKey: (NSString *)  accessKey
withSecretKey: (NSString *)  secretKey 

Inits the client with the access key and the secret key.

Parameters:
accessKey The AWS Access Key
secretKey The AWS Secret Key
- (id AmazonWebServiceClient.)initWithCredentials: (AmazonCredentials *)  theCredentials  

Inits the client the given credentials.

- (AmazonServiceResponse * AmazonWebServiceClient.)invoke: (AmazonServiceRequest *)  generatedRequest
rawRequest: (AmazonServiceRequestConfig *)  originalRequest
unmarshallerDelegate: (Class)  unmarshallerDelegate 

Utility method that sends the raw S3 Request to be processed.

Parameters:
request An AmazonServiceRequest describing the parameters of a request.
Returns:
The response from the service.

Property Documentation

- (NSString *) endpoint [read, write, retain]

The service endpoint to which requests should be sent.

- (int) maxRetries [read, write, assign]

The maximum number of retry attempts for failed retryable requests (ex: 5xx error responses from a service).

Default is 5.

- (NSTimeInterval) timeout [read, write, assign]

The amount of time to wait (in milliseconds) for data to be transfered over an established, open connection before the connection times out and is closed.

Default is 240 seconds.

- (NSString *) userAgent [read, write, retain]

The HTTP user agent header to send with all requests.
